question: 凝り
sourceAnswer:
<read>しこり</read>|<read>こり</read>:: muscle-stiffness-(esp.-in-shoulders) | lump-(in-tissue,-esp.-breast)/swelling/hardening/lesion | lingering-discomfort/uneasiness/bad-aftertaste/unpleasant-feeling
<read>こごり</read>:: congealing/jelly | jellied-fish-broth
